titleStmt.title: The Countesse of Pembrokes Arcadia, written by Sir Philippe Sidnei
Arcadia
titleStmt.author: Sidney, Philip, Sir, 1554-1586.
Gwinne, Matthew, 1558?-1627, attributed name.
Greville, Fulke, Baron Brooke, 1554-1628, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Windet for william Ponsonbie,

notesStmt.note: Possibly edited by Matthew Gwinne and Fulke Greville.
A4v has a printer's note. Variant: A4v blank.
A variant (STC 22539a) lacks printer's name in imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
